statements: SELECT * FROM robot_info WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, configuration FROM robot_info WHERE robot_name LIKE 'R2-%';
SELECT robot_id, status_updates FROM robot_info WHERE configuration->>'arm_count' = '2';
SELECT * FROM robot_info ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robot_info WHERE status_updates->>'battery_level' < '20';
SELECT * FROM robot_info WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, created_at FROM robot_info WHERE status_updates->>'battery_level' > '50';
SELECT robot_name, configuration FROM robot_info WHERE configuration->'dimensions' @> '{"width": 20, "height": 30}';
SELECT * FROM robot_info WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, status_updates FROM robot_info ORDER BY robot_name DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotConfigurations
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_name = 'Robot-X'
SELECT * FROM RobotStatusUpdates ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT robot_id, status FROM RobotStatusUpdates WHERE status = 'running'
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM RobotStatusUpdates GROUP BY robot_id
SELECT * FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, configuration FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT robot_name, configuration FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE configuration->>'status' = 'active' ORDER BY robot_name ASC;
SELECT rc.robot_name, rs.status, rs.updated_at FROM RobotConfigurations rc JOIN RobotStatusUpdates rs ON rc.robot_id = rs.robot_id WHERE rs.status = 'offline';

SELECT rc.robot_name, rs.status, rs.updated_at FROM RobotConfigurations rc LEFT JOIN RobotStatusUpdates rs ON rc.robot_id = rs.robot_id WHERE rs.updated_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY rs.updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM robot_configurations;
SELECT robot_name, year_manufactured, model_number FROM robot_configurations;
SELECT id, robot_name, year_manufactured, configuration FROM robot_configurations WHERE year_manufactured >= 2010;
SELECT id, robot_name, model_number FROM robot_configurations ORDER BY model_number DESC;
SELECT robot_name, status, last_updated FROM robot_statuses JOIN robot_configurations ON robot_statuses.robot_id = robot_configurations.id;
SELECT * FROM robot_configurations WHERE year_manufactured > 2020;
SELECT robot_name, model_number, year_manufactured FROM robot_configurations WHERE robot_name LIKE 'R2%';
SELECT rc.robot_name, rs.status, rs.last_updated FROM robot_configurations rc JOIN robot_statuses rs ON rc.id = rs.robot_id;
SELECT rt.task_name, rt.task_description, rt.task_status, rs.status FROM robot_tasks rt JOIN robot_statuses rs ON rt.id = rs.robot_id WHERE rt.task_priority > 3;
SELECT rc.robot_name, rc.configuration->>'color' AS color, rc.configuration->>'size' AS size FROM robot_configurations rc WHERE rc.configuration->>'type' = 'android';
SELECT * FROM RobotConfigurations;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, configuration_details FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT status_message, battery_level FROM RobotStatus ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT robot_id, error_message, timestamp FROM RobotErrors WHERE error_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM RobotLogs WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, configuration_details FROM RobotConfigurations WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT rc.robot_name, rs.status_message, rs.battery_level FROM RobotConfigurations rc JOIN RobotStatus rs ON rc.robot_id = rs.robot_id;
SELECT re.error_message, rl.log_message FROM RobotErrors re JOIN RobotLogs rl ON re.robot_id = rl.robot_id;

SELECT rc.robot_name, rs.status_message, rl.log_message FROM RobotConfigurations rc JOIN RobotStatus rs ON rc.robot_id = rs.robot_id JOIN RobotLogs rl ON rc.robot_id = rl.robot_id ORDER BY rs.last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Configurations
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM Robot_Configurations ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT configuration FROM Robot_Configurations WHERE name = 'Robot1'
SELECT status, battery_level FROM Robot_Status WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM Robot_Events WHERE event_type LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM Robot_Configurations WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, configuration FROM Robot_Configurations WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, status, battery_level FROM Robot_Status WHERE status LIKE 'Running%' ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT event_type, description FROM Robot_Events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Robot_Errors WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY occurred_at ASC;
